statements: SELECT * FROM student_engagement
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM student_engagement
SELECT engagement_level, student_id FROM student_engagement
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT performance_score, engagement_level FROM student_engagement
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, engagement_level FROM student_engagement WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT engagement_level, performance_score FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_level BETWEEN 2 AND 3 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, engagement_level, performance_score FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 1 AND performance_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement ORDER BY engagement_level ASC, performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, performance_score FROM students WHERE engagement_level > 5;
SELECT student_id, name FROM students ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE category='Sports';
SELECT activity_name, completion_date FROM activities WHERE completion_status=true;
SELECT name, engagement_level, performance_score FROM students WHERE engagement_level > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC, name ASC
SELECT activity_name, category FROM activities WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT student_id, name, engagement_level FROM students JOIN activities ON students.student_id = activities.activity_id WHERE category = 'Math' AND completion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM students WHERE engagement_level < 50 AND performance_score > 75 ORDER BY name ASC, engagement_level DESC
SELECT activity_name, completion_status FROM activities WHERE completion_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY activity_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, performance_level FROM students WHERE engagement_level > 3;

SELECT student_name, activity_name FROM students JOIN student_activities ON students.student_id = student_activities.student_id JOIN activities ON student_activities.activity_id = activities.activity_id;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities WHERE activity_points > 10;

SELECT student_name, activity_name, completion_status FROM students JOIN student_activities ON students.student_id = student_activities.student_id JOIN activities ON student_activities.activity_id = activities.activity_id WHERE students.performance_level > 4;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_points < 50 ORDER BY activity_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, activity_name FROM students JOIN student_activities ON students.student_id = student_activities.student_id JOIN activities ON activities.activity_id = student_activities.activity_id WHERE completion_status = TRUE;

SELECT student_name, SUM(activity_points) AS total_points FROM students JOIN student_activities ON students.student_id = student_activities.student_id JOIN activities ON activities.activity_id = student_activities.activity_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM student_activities JOIN students ON students.student_id = student_activities.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, completed_activities FROM students WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT activity_name, topic FROM activities WHERE difficulty_level < 4;
SELECT name, completed, date_completed FROM student_activities WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, name, subject FROM teachers;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, completed_activities FROM students WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE topic = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT s.name, a.activity_name, sa.completed, sa.date_completed FROM students s JOIN student_activities sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id JOIN activities a ON sa.activity_id = a.activity_id;
SELECT t.name AS teacher_name, COUNT(s.student_id) AS num_students FROM teachers t LEFT JOIN students s ON t.subject = 'Mathematics' GROUP BY t.name;
SELECT * FROM Teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_teacher_id = '12345';
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_due_date DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 'b7b64a25-6b3a-4c04-b2bf-20df92c221e5';
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_id = 'f4a52448-9681-45a2-9487-1081f5ad4f2d';
SELECT course_name, course_teacher_id FROM Courses WHERE course_id = '45c2b578-26de-470e-b613-6e784ac655a7';
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_level > 2;
SELECT grade_score FROM Grades WHERE grade_student_id = 'db5783d2-5f1f-478b-918d-4d0274b91f70';
